mutants.code:
def reverse_and_trim(s):
    s = s.strip()
    s = s.replace('', '')
    return s[::-1]

def reverse_and_trim(s):
    s = s.strip()
    s = s.replace(' ', 'MUTATED')
    return s[::-1]

def reverse_and_trim(s):
    s = s.strip()
    s = s.replace(' ', '')
    return s[::+1]

def reverse_and_trim(s):
    s = s.strip()
    s = s.replace(' ', '')
    return s[::-2]

def reverse_and_trim(s):
    s = s.strip()
    s = s.replace(' ', '')
    return s[::-0]

def reverse_and_trim(s):
    s = s.strip()
    s = s.replace(' ', '')
    return s[::-0]

def reverse_and_trim(s):
    s = s.strip()
    s = s.replace(' ', '')
    return s[::--1]
